original_title: The Grates: Til Death Do Us Party (Live At The Forum)
overview: Set against the winter wonderland backdrop of falling snow, ice-laden fir trees, super-sized penguins and assorted woodland creatures, The Grates bring to life the magic of their ARIA, AMP and J Award-nominated gold debut album, Gravity Won't Get You High - ably assisted by a 6ft panda playing a mean banjo!
title: The Grates: Til Death Do Us Party (Live At The Forum)
